branchCategory.name: ASR/ASQ
branchCategory.description: ASR/ASQ (PFC/QFC valve) can reduce air consumption by 25%. The PFC control valve has a pressure adjustment and speed control function. The QFC control valve offers a high speed exhaust and cylinder speed control function. Series ASR/ASQ with one-touch fitting (Pressure/Flow valve), can reduce air consumption by 40%. The pressure valve has a regulator with check valve, plus speed controller. The flow valve offers a quick supply and exhaust valve, plus a speed controller.

branchItem.name: ASR*30/ASQ*30, Air Saving Valve (PFC/QFC Valve)
branchItem.description: ASR/ASQ (PFC/QFC valve) can reduce air consumption by 25%. The PFC control valve has a pressure adjustment and speed control function. The QFC control valve offers a high speed exhaust and cylinder speed control function. Series ASR/ASQ with one-touch fitting (Pressure/Flow valve), can reduce air consumption by 40%. The pressure valve has a regulator with check valve, plus speed controller. The flow valve offers a quick supply and exhaust valve, plus a speed controller.
branchItem.bullets: <UL> <LI>Can reduce air consumption by 25% <LI>Fluid: air <LI>Max. operating pressure: 7kgf/cm<SUP> 2</SUP> (700kPa) 145PSI <LI>ASR (PFC valve): control valve that has pressure<BR>adjustment and speed control functions <LI>ASQ (QFC valve): control valve that has high<BR>speed exhaust and cylinder speed control functions <LI>Metric and NPT threads </LI></UL>

branchItem.name: ASR/ASQ, Air Saving Valve (PFC/QFC Valve), Metric
branchItem.description: ASR/ASQ (PFC/QFC valve) can reduce air consumption by 25%. The PFC control valve has a pressure adjustment and speed control function. The QFC control valve offers a high speed exhaust and cylinder speed control function. Series ASR/ASQ with one-touch fitting (Pressure/Flow valve), can reduce air consumption by 40%. The pressure valve has a regulator with check valve, plus speed controller. The flow valve offers a quick supply and exhaust valve, plus a speed controller.

branchItem.name: ASR/Q, Air Saving Speed Controller
branchItem.description: <p>AS-R/AS-Q can reduce air consumption by 25%.  The AS-R functions to reduce return stroke pressure.  The AS-Q functions as a rapid supply and exhaust to avoid sudden extension of piston and avoid delay in pressure charge.  The updated AS-R/AS-Q now combines multiple adjustments to one to simplify operations.</p>
